ul_30558: sudo dolphin

au_675898: /usr/bin/sudo

pkexec chmod u+s,g-x /usr/bin/sudo

sudo echo "sudo works again! Yay! :D"

mount -o remount,rw /
chmod u=rwxs,g=rx,o=rx /usr/bin/sudo /usr/bin/pkexec
exit
